name: Pico's Factory
description:
Oh no! A factory has made EVIL CLONES of Pico's friends... and enemies.

A mix of shooting (sorta) and platforming (sorta)

Includes Characters from Pico's School, Tankmen, and Henry Stickmin.

Based on Pico Vs. Bear a little.

I made this game in a month for Pico Day. It only has 3 levels, which is a shame, but it also has brought perhaps the worst sprites ever to be found in a newgrounds game.
